DATA PROTECTION CONTROLS \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.1.  No Access by Default\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By default, EPAM prefers not to have access to production data (including personal information/PII) and EPAM personnel should seek alternatives to accessing, handling or processing such production data (including personal information/PII).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Customer production data (either complete sets or masked parts) are not and shall not be used for testing on EPAM's premises or in the public cloud; only fictitious test data is acceptable. See at PAL.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If any data that seems to be personal information or PII is received from the Customer, the Project Manager or Account Manager must seek written confirmation from the Customer that the data is fictitious test data and not personal information/production/PII data. Until such written confirmation is received from the Customer, such data shall be handled as if it were personal information (or PII) and (except in cases where EPAM would be in breach of contract) their usage for testing purposes shall be suspended.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.2. all.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a Customer asks for support-/maintenance-related work on their production EPAM must prevent violations of laws and regulations and thus does not allow EPAM resources to be affected.
